verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man שִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> sim set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward גּוֹג֙ <S%H1463><s%> goyG against Gog אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land הַמָּג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> ham-ma-Gog, of Magog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the chief מֶ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-mar-ta, And say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha I am against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Gog, Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <S%H8422><s%> ve-tu-Val. and Tubal

וְשׁ֣וֹבַבְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shoav-Ti-cha, And I will turn thee back וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and put חַחִ֖ים <S%H2397><s%> cha-Chim hooks בִּלְחָיֶ֑יךָ <S%H3895><s%> bil-cha-Yei-cha; into thy jaws וְהוֹצֵאתִי֩ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ti and I will bring thee forth אוֹתְךָ֨ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all חֵילֶ֜ךָ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Le-cha and all thine army סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses וּפָרָשִׁ֗ים <S%H6571><s%> u-fa-ra-Shim, and horsemen לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <S%H3847><s%> le-vu-Shei all of them clothed מִכְלוֹל֙ <S%H4358><s%> mich-lOl with all sorts כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam, all קָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> ka-Hal company רָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> rav [of armour even] a great צִנָּ֣ה <S%H6793><s%> tzin-Nah [with] bucklers וּמָגֵ֔ן <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-Gen, and shields תֹּפְשֵׂ֥י <S%H8610><s%> to-fe-Sei all of them handling חֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2719><s%> cha-ra-Vot swords כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

פָּרַ֛ס <S%H6539><s%> pa-Ras Persia כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Ethiopia וּפ֖וּט <S%H6316><s%> u-Fut and Libya אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam; for כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all מָגֵ֥ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen with them all of them with shield וְכוֹבָֽע׃ <S%H3553><s%> ve-cho-Va'. and helmet

גֹּ֚מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Go-mer Gomer וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֲגַפֶּ֔יהָ <S%H102><s%> 'a-gap-Pei-ha, and all his bands בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house תּֽוֹגַרְמָ֔ה <S%H8425><s%> to-gar-Mah, of Togarmah יַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> yar-ke-Tei quarters צָפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon of the north וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲגַפָּ֑יו <S%H102><s%> 'a-gap-Pav; and all his bands עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim [and] many אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach. for

הִכֹּן֙ <S%H3559><s%> hik-Kon Be thou prepared וְהָכֵ֣ן <S%H3559><s%> ve-ha-Chen and prepare לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all קְהָלֶ֖ךָ <S%H6951><s%> ke-ha-Le-cha for thyself thou and all thy company הַנִּקְהָלִ֣ים <S%H6950><s%> han-nik-ha-Lim that are assembled עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha; about וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לְמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> le-mish-Mar. unto thee and be thou a guard

מִיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim days רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim After many תִּפָּקֵד֒ <S%H6485><s%> tip-pa-Ked thou shalt be visited בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <S%H319><s%> be-'a-cha-Rit in the latter הַשָּׁנִ֜ים <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nim years תָּב֣וֹא׀ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo thou shalt come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אֶ֣רֶץ׀ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz into the land מְשׁוֹבֶ֣בֶת <S%H7725><s%> me-sho-Ve-vet [that is] brought back מֵחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me-Che-rev, from the sword מְקֻבֶּ֙צֶת֙ <S%H6908><s%> me-kub-Be-tzet [and is] gathered מֵעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mim people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, out of many עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu had been לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Bah waste תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; which have been always וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi he מֵעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mim out of the nations הוּצָ֔אָה <S%H3318><s%> hu-Tza-'ah, but it is brought forth וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-she-Vu and they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach safely כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Li-ta Thou shalt ascend כַּשֹּׁאָ֣ה <S%H7722><s%> kash-sho-'Ah like a storm תָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo, and come כֶּעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> ke-'a-Nan thou shalt be like a cloud לְכַסּ֥וֹת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot to cover הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh; become אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <S%H102><s%> 'a-gap-Pei-cha, thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mim people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim and many אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> o-Tach. for ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; GOD וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom It shall also come to pass [that] at the same time הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יַעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu come דְבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim shall things עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Ve-cha, into thy mind וְחָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H2803><s%> ve-cha-shav-Ta and thou shalt think מַחֲשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H4284><s%> ma-cha-She-vet thought רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah. an evil

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta, And thou shalt say אֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh I will go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz to the land פְּרָז֔וֹת <S%H6519><s%> pe-ra-Zot, of unwalled villages אָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> a-Vo I will go הַשֹּׁ֣קְטִ֔ים <S%H8252><s%> hash-Sho-ke-Tim, to them that are at rest יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei that dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach; safely כֻּלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam, all יֹֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim all of them dwelling בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> be-'Ein without חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah, without walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-Ri-ach and having neither bars וּדְלָתַ֖יִם <S%H1817><s%> u-de-la-Ta-yim nor gates אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein and having לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem.

לִשְׁלֹ֥ל <S%H7997><s%> lish-Lol To take שָׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal a spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> ve-la-Voz and to take בַּ֑ז <S%H957><s%> Baz; a prey לְהָשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> le-ha-Shiv to turn יָדְךָ֜ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against חֳרָב֣וֹת <S%H2723><s%> cho-ra-Vot upon the desolate places נוֹשָׁבֹ֗ת <S%H3427><s%> no-sha-Vot, [that are now] inhabited וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and against עַם֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am and upon the people מְאֻסָּ֣ף <S%H622><s%> me-'us-Saf [that are] gathered מִגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> mig-go-Yim, out of the nations עֹשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh which have gotten מִקְנֶ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> mik-Neh cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <S%H7075><s%> ve-kin-Yan, and goods יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei that dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against טַבּ֥וּר <S%H2872><s%> tab-Bur in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

שְׁבָ֡א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va Sheba וּ֠דְדָן <S%H1719><s%> U-de-don and Dedan וְסֹחֲרֵ֨י <S%H5503><s%> ve-so-cha-Rei and the merchants תַרְשִׁ֤ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish of Tarshish וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all כְּפִרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3715><s%> ke-fi-Rei-ha with all the young lions יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru thereof shall say לְךָ֔ le-Cha, הֲלִשְׁלֹ֤ל <S%H7997><s%> ha-lish-Lol to take שָׁלָל֙ <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal prey אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah have you בָ֔א <S%H935><s%> Va, unto thee Art thou come הֲלָבֹ֥ז <S%H962><s%> ha-la-Voz to take בַּ֖ז <S%H957><s%> baz plunder הִקְהַ֣לְתָּ <S%H6950><s%> hik-Hal-ta assemble קְהָלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6951><s%> ke-ha-Le-cha; thy company לָשֵׂ֣את׀ <S%H5375><s%> la-Set to carry כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef silver וְזָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav, and gold לָקַ֙חַת֙ <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat to take away מִקְנֶ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> mik-Neh cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <S%H7075><s%> ve-kin-Yan, and goods לִשְׁלֹ֖ל <S%H7997><s%> lish-Lol to take שָׁלָ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal prey גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol. a great ס sa-Mek

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לְג֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> le-Gog, unto Gog כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הֲל֣וֹא׀ <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he בְּשֶׁ֨בֶת <S%H3427><s%> be-She-vet dwelleth עַמִּ֧י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi when my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach safely תֵּדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> te-Da'. shalt thou not know
